item.title: Real Craze Zone – Episode 4_Free dollar notes
item.dc:creator: Adeyemi Oduyungbo
item.description: Its not everything that looks free that is actually free. Africa is a differnt bplace entirely!!
item.content:encoded:
Contentment is an emotional state of satisfaction that can be seen as a mental state, maybe drawn from being at ease in one’s situation, body and mind. Colloquially speaking, contentment could be a state of having accepted one’s situation and is a milder and more tentative form of happiness. Contentment and the pursuit of contentment are possibly a central thread through many philosophical or religious schools across diverse cultures, times and geographies.  These guys found these dollar notes on the floor, but forgot thier virtue of contentment.  One of them took the money and paid for it.  This is africa!!!

Kindly support by downloading this content… Much love!!

item.title: Real Craze Zone – Episode 3_Desperate lagos girl
item.dc:creator: Adeyemi Oduyungbo
item.description: Fine girl with no toaster... The irony of life.
item.content:encoded:
This is the story of a beautiful lady who shuns all guys approaching her.  At some points, all guys became used to this.  No guy approaches her anymore.  She’s now ripe for marriage, but no one is interested in her anymore.  Some are scared of the embarrassment thta might be resulted into.  Pride comes before downfall, she has so much beauty but her pride has pushed everyone off.  Humility is all…

Please, do not forget to download this video, support our work… Much blessings… smiles…

item.title: Real Craze Zone – Episode 2_Broke and handsome
item.dc:creator: Adeyemi Oduyungbo
item.description: He just had to embarrass himself for no reason!!!
item.content:encoded:
Dressing well and looking sophisticated is good.  The problem comes when there is no correspondence with how much you have left in your pocket.  There’s always a need to save and invests for the future, not squandering all to look good just for today.   This is a short story of a guy who has nothing left in his pocket after all his squandering on physical appearance.  He decides to approach a girl and ends up disgracing himself in the process.  This story is a typical illustration of the naija saying “Na money be fine Bobo”.

Please do not forget to download though… That’s the support we need from you.

item.title: Real Craze Zone – Episode 1_Mrs Ebony Lips
item.dc:creator: Adeyemi Oduyungbo
item.description: Watch how Mrs ebony Lips is giving us some funny lamba... Please support us by downloading this.
item.content:encoded:
Mrs Ebony Lips is an internet sensation in Nigeria, a very popular one at that.  She is known for her courage and how she handles what people throw at her.  Here, she’s seen expressing her thought with regards some issues.  Her comic way of putting this makes everything funny.  Listening to her puts off bad moods and replaces it with laughter all through.  Watch and be blessed.  Much love.

Please, do not forget to download. Smiles…
